casebody.data:
No. 09-1255. Patricia Limmer, Billye Joyce Smith, and Bobby Jean Nothnagel, Petitioners v. Missouri Pacific Railroad Company, dba Union Pacific Railroad Company. 562 U.S. 829, 131 S. Ct. 75,

178 L. Ed. 2d 25,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6228. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Texas denied.

Same case below, 299 S.W.3d 78.
